main event: A electronic engineer working on the Apollo project observed an unidentified fast-moving object that changed colors and exhibited unusual maneuverability in the sky over Anaheim, California.
interesting points: The object was brighter than Venus and traveled from north to south before disappearing quickly at a 15-20 degree angle.
The object changed in brightness, size, and color, going from brilliant white to reddish, bluish, and greenish.
The object was cigar-shaped, approximately 45-50 feet long and 17-18 feet wide, and did not have any trail or sound.
The observer thought the object might have been a satellite re-entry, but its behavior, such as the change in size and shape, was unusual.
The observer was familiar with ballistic missiles and satellite devices, but had never seen anything like this object before.
witnesses: an electronic engineer working on the Apollo project
